mapper.insert: insert into question_option (question_id, content, correct, sort_order) values (#{o.questionId}, #{o.content}, #{o.correct}, #{o.sortOrder})
mapper.select: select id, question_id, content, correct, sort_order from question_option where question_id = #{questionId} order by sort_order, id
select id, question_id, content, correct, sort_order from question_option where question_id in #{id} order by question_id, sort_order, id
